[Technical Content] NinjaTrader 8 Code Breaking Changes

Between 2014 and 2016, I worked as a Jr product manager at NinjaTrader, LLC where I played a significant role in adapting the specification, documentation, and testing strategies in a team effort to ensure the milestone transition between products was seamless and lived up to customer expectations...
